description: Gott's Roadside, established by brothers Joel and Duncan Gott in St. Helena in 1999, offers a diverse menu that includes meals, tacos, beer, and ice cream. It is celebrated for its contemporary California-inspired dishes, crafted with locally sourced ingredients. The store is situated on the left side of the Ferry Building, featuring a roadside restaurant and a walk-through ice cream store inside.
address: One Ferry Building, The Embarcadero S, San Francisco, CA 94111

product1.description: The California flavor hamburger with below ingredients: Fried egg, Cowgirl Creamery's Wagon Wheel cheese, Zoe's bacon, arugula, balsamic onions & mayo on a toasted sesame brioche bun.
product1.name: California Burger
